name: 新聞英語
goals: To expand on all four core skills of English, in particular reading comprehension and speaking skill.
To develop familiarity for the journalistic style.
To become aware of current events & important issues such globalization.
To provide students an opportunity to reflect on the impacts of current global and social trends.
syllabus:
**News English**  **新聞英語**

**Course Description**  **課程描述**

Reading the news is not only a way to stay informed of current events, it’s also a great way to improve one’s language skill. In this course, students will read, listen to and study news reports pertaining to different facets of life and regarding various dimensions of global affairs. Through analysis and discussion of news articles taken from a variety of domestic and international news sources, this course provides students an opportunity to expand on all four skills with respect to news media English and relevant information literacy.  

閱讀新聞能使人增廣見聞，也能從中增進語言能力。此課程會讓同學閱讀關於全球多方新聞。透過研究與討論摘錄自國際媒體報導的新聞，同學有機會擴展自己英語的四項核心能力與增進溝通技巧。

**Recommended Text:**

Pete Sharma, _Reading the News_. 2007. Boston: Thomson.
